CustomField.description: This is a manually populated optional field to indicate what filter is applied when a user views a read-only view of the Total Exposure Visualforce page. Only one statistic configuration can be enabled with this checkbox per exposure type. By default, the checkbox is unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a manually populated optional field to indicate what filter is applied when a user views a read-only view of the Total Exposure Visualforce page.
CustomField.label: Display in Read-Only Total Exposure
